p: The most affected system organ class was the central nervous system, without showing a clear difference between active treatment and placebo. The system organ class that showed the highest percentage of affected subjects with a noticeable difference between active treatment and placebo was the gastrointestinal system. For details of affected system organ classes see Table 4. A significantly higher relative risk for subjects on active treatment versus placebo for experiencing a TEAE was shown for an overall TEAE and for a TEAE of the gastrointestinal system. For details see Figure 1.
